cells.data:
What is doctype? Why do you need it?

-Doctype instructs the browser about the version and how it should be rendered. Doctype is required to validate markup
<!DOCTYPE html>
Data attribute: Allows the storage of extra data in the DOM. You can access the data attribute using JS.
Mark: highlight text
Some part of this paragraph is highlighted by using mark element.

Span vs div
Div is a block element, span is an inline element. You cannot put a block element within a inline element.
Div, section & article

<div>, conveys no meaning
<section>, group of content related to a single theme. a chunk of related content, like a subsection of a long article. may have a heading and/or footer
<article>, stands alone, makes sense if encountered somewhere else (RSS feed), composition in a doc, page, all, or site.
SVG (Scalable Vector Graphic): high fidelity docs for viewing and printing, static images
Semantic HTML: Tags used to structure content as selected and applied appropriately to the meaning of the content. This also helps for SEO, accessibility, reporposing, light code.
